Detailed Description

Factory class for making chip streams based on a string representation.

int QuantMethodFactory::openPrecompFeatureEffects ( const std::string &  fileName,
double *  effects,
const ChipLayout &  layout 
) [static]

Open a file and read the precomputed probe effects to use in plier from it.

Parameters:
fileName - Path to file containing probe effects.
effects - Map of probe ids to probe effects to be filled in.

File must be tab delimited and contain the columns: "probeset_id", "probe_id", and "feature_response"

Parameters:
fileName - Path to file containing probe effects.
effects - Map of probe ids to probe effects to be filled in.
opts - Options used in filling in.
